answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
Hi Jennifer,
Our library (Virginia Beach Public) uses a mobile app for our catalog and we use Library Thing's Terms of Use.  https://www.librarything.com/forlibraries/about/terms
Not sure if this is exactly what you are looking for, but I hope this helps.

answers.author: Cory Fleming
answers.text:
Jennifer - There's a summit coming up, sponsored by the Open311 working group of Code for America, next month that will highlight the protocols that group is developing.  I believe the summit is scheduled for October 14 and I understand that people will be able to participate remotely.  Something you might want to keep an eye on as it relates to mobile apps.

author: Jennifer Smith
text:
Seeking Terms of Service (TOS) examples for Mobile apps. (We're launching apps in the next month or two and hope to not recreate the wheel). In the next couple days, please send to me at jksmith@arlingtonva.us OR respond via this tool. Many thanks!
Jennifer K. Smith
Office of Communications
Arlington County Government
title: TOS for Mobile App?
